item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR COMBINATION LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Put protective tape around the rear combination light assembly LH.
Detach the 2 pins as shown in the illustration.
Disconnect the connector and remove the rear combination light assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR COMBINATION LIGHT GASKET LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the rear combination light gasket LH.

atten3.ptxt: Be sure to remove the gasket completely from the body.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR TURN SIGNAL LIGHT BULB

s2.ptxt: Turn the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration and remove the socket.
Remove the rear turn signal light bulb from the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.
Turn the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration and remove the socket.
Remove the back up light bulb from the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE TAIL AND STOP LIGHT BULB

s2.ptxt: Turn the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration and remove the socket.
Remove the tail and stop light bulb from the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Detach the guide and remove the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.
